title: Rs 2,000 crore loss for HP's tourism sector in July-Aug; hoteliers offer discounts to increase footfall
description: The tourism sector in Himachal Pradesh has suffered losses of approximately Rs 2,000 crore due to heavy rains and low footfall in July and August. The industry, which contributes over Rs 14,000 crore annually to the state's GDP, was already in the process of recovering from the impact of Covid-19.
